recipe.title: Smoked Salmon and Cucumber Ribbon Salad with Caraway
ingredients: 1 small Granny Smith apple, cored, thinly sliced
instructions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in small bowl; season dressing with salt and pepper. Cut cucumber crosswise in half. Using vegetable peeler, cut into long strips to form ribbons. Scatter cucumber, watercress, and apple on 4 plates. Tuck in slices of salmon. Drizzle dressing over.
